smsVerification.subTitle: SMS Verification
smsVerification.message: We need customer's mobile phone to register. Customer will receive an OTP to confirm the number.

idVerification.subTitle: ID Verification
idVerification.message: We need the identity document (DPI/License/Passport) of the customer to confirm the Identity. Is that ok?

photoVerification.subTitle: Photo Verification
photoVerification.message: We need to take a picture of customer's face to match with your identity document and to comply with local laws. Is this ok?

document.subTitle: Identification Document
document.instructionText: To continue, please take a photo of DPI, License or Passport of the client

photo.subTitle: Face Photo
photo.instructionText: To continue, take a photo of the customer's face

initialize.title: WELCOME
initialize.message_1: Congratulations!!. Welcome to your new QuieroCripto POS
initialize.message_2: Press initialize to generate a secure cryptographic certificate for your machine.

pairingScan.title: Pair with remote server
pairingScan.message: Press SCAN and present the machine with the pairing QR code from your remote server.

previewPurchase.title: Review the purchase
previewPurchase.message: Review the customer's transaction before proceeding

registerPhone.title: Register Client's Mobile number
registerPhone.message: Add customer's phone number to register. Customer will receive an OTP to confirm

cvvScreen.title: Confirm CVV
cvvScreen.message: Confirm your card by typing your CVV (3 or 4 digit code in the back side of the card)

creditCard.title: Insert or swipe credit/debit card
creditCard.message: Please swipe or insert credit/debit card of user to complete payment

creditCardAgain.title: Insert or swipe credit/debit card again
creditCardAgain.message: Oops! There was a problem. Please swipe or insert credit/debit card again of user to complete payment

review.title: Customer Transaction Review
review.message: Pídale al cliente que revise la transacción antes de continuar

scanAddress.title: Scan the Wallet Address
scanAddress.message: Ask the customer to show his wallet address (QR code)

securityCode.title: Confirm Telephone
securityCode.message: Confirm customer's phone number with OTP

lowBalance.title: We're out of coins!
lowBalance.mesage: Sorry but we are running low on coins. Try Again later!!

blockedCustomer.title: Transaction limit reached
blockedCustomer.message: Due to local regulations, you've reached your transaction limit

noInternet.title: No Internet Connection
noInternet.message: You are not connected to the Internet. Check your internet connection and try again!

networkDown.title: Server Down
networkDown.message: Oops! Our servers are down currently. We will back soon.

pairingDevice.title: Error Pairing Device
pairingDevice.message: We experienced an error when attempting to pair the device. Try Again!

addressReuse.title: Address already used once
addressReuse.message: For both your privacy and safety against scams, please generate a new one from your wallet and scan that one instead.

printingError.title: Error Printing Receipt
printingError.message: Please contact the operator to fix the problem

badSecurityCode.title: Incorrect OTP
badSecurityCode.message: You entered incorrect OTP to confirm your phone. Start Again

paymentError.title: Error Processing Payment
paymentError.message: We encountered an error processing payment with your card. Try Again!

camera.title: Permission to use camera
camera.message: We need your permission to use your camera

audio.title: Permission to use audio recording
audio.message: We need your permission to use your audio

goback.title: Hold on!
goback.message: Application will go to home screen. Are your sure?

shutdown.title: Hold on!
shutdown.message: Application will shutdown. Are your sure?
